conversations.body_text: Hi Jay,  I apologize for the delayed response.I apologize for not responding to you promptly. I see your package has been delivered. Have you received it?  https://www.ups.com/track?loc=en_US&requester=ST&trackNums=1ZJ455510414675712/trackdetails
